<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step"> <x_sthc_testing_sui_test_step action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <applicaiton>HB</applicaiton> <assignment_group/> <detailed_description/> <expected_result>VERIFY: The technical charges routed correctly to the study related, bill to study; study related, bill to patient/insurance; or to the not study related bucket.
